llm_response:
```yaml
name: Static analysis

on:
  pull_request:

jobs:
  static-psalm-analysis:
    id: static-psalm-analysis
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    strategy:
      matrix:
        ocp-version: [v20.0.7, v21.0.0, dev-stable22, dev-stable23, dev-master]

    steps:
    - name: Checkout
      uses: actions/checkout@master

    - name: Set up PHP
      uses: shivammathur/setup-php@master
      with:
        php-version: '7.4'
        tools: 'composer:v1'
        coverage: 'none'

    - name: Install dependencies
      run: composer i

    - name: Install dependencies
      run: composer require --dev christophwurst/nextcloud:${{ matrix.ocp-version }}

    - name: Run coding standards check
      run: composer run psalm
```
answer:
name: Static analysis

on:
  pull_request:

jobs:
  static-psalm-analysis:
    id: static-psalm-analysis
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    strategy:
      matrix:
        ocp-version: [v20.0.7, v21.0.0, dev-stable22, dev-stable23, dev-master]

    steps:
    - name: Checkout
      uses: actions/checkout@master

    - name: Set up PHP
      uses: shivammathur/setup-php@master
      with:
        php-version: '7.4'
        tools: 'composer:v1'
        coverage: 'none'

    - name: Install dependencies
      run: composer i

    - name: Install dependencies
      run: composer require --dev christophwurst/nextcloud:${{ matrix.ocp-version }}

    - name: Run coding standards check
      run: composer run psalm

errors.message: unexpected key "id" for "job" section. expected one of "concurrency", "container", "continue-on-error", "defaults", "env", "environment", "if", "name", "needs", "outputs", "permissions", "runs-on", "secrets", "services", "steps", "strategy", "timeout-minutes", "uses", "with"
